Parameter/Rule: Ensure 'Enforce password history' is set to '24 or more password(s)'

Configure 'Accounts: Rename guest account'

Category: Windows Defender Firewall with Advanced Security

Category: Windows Defender Firewall with Advanced Security
Parameter/Rule: Ensure 'Windows Firewall: Private: Inbound connections' is set to 'Block (default)'

Parameter/Rule: Ensure 'Windows Firewall: Private: Outbound connections' is set to 'Allow (default)'

Parameter/Rule: Ensure 'Windows Firewall: Private: Settings: Display a notification' is set to 'No'

Parameter/Rule: Ensure 'Windows Firewall: Private: Logging: Name' is set to '%SystemRoot%\\System32\\logfiles\\firewall\\privatefw.log'

Parameter/Rule: Ensure 'Windows Firewall: Private: Logging: Size limit (KB)' is set to '16,384 KB or greater'

Parameter/Rule: Ensure 'Windows Firewall: Private: Logging: Log successful connections' is set to 'Yes'
